item.description:
Howl at the Moon is the ideal place for a Halloween Happy Hour.

Here is a link with a FREE admission coupon which you must print, complete and present.

Featuring Jager shots, 86 oz Buckets of OOZE! and Angry Orchard Hard Cider all night long!

And what is a Halloween party without a costume contest?! And how 'bout TWO CONTESTS? There will be $1,500 in cash and prizes to the winners! FIRST CONTEST at 8pm for HAPPY HOUR winners & the SECOND CONTEST is at 10:30pm!

Expect a high-energy dueling pianos throwdown where the piano players and staff not only entertain you but if you choose, you can become part of the show too.

Showtime is from 6 PM until 10 PM.

Come sing, dance, and howl the night away as the most versatile and talented musicians perform your favorite songs from the 70's, 80's, 90's, and today on pianos, guitars, and more!

Arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able.

Here are links forÂ the Howl Food Menu and Howl Drink Menu

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearby subway stations are Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk away.
item.name: Howl-O-Ween Happy Hour Bash
